about_the_game:
Welcome home, Master!

STORY


One day on your way home from work, you see a girl in front of your apartment building. That wasn't the only surprise as she also appeared to have cat ears and a tail as well. Bathed in a gentle glow, you also notice the small wings on her back. Your life drastically changes upon the appearance of Mint, who claims to be an angel and became stranded on Earth with nowhere to go. This is the start of your exciting life with the energetic Mint as she learns more about life on Earth as well as you, her new master.

NEKO-MIMI SWEET HOUSEMATES is a new visual novel series focusing on the mascot characters created by illustrator, Yano Mitsuki!

FEATURES

  • Single route, kinetic visual novel
  • Character designs by illustrator, Yano Mitsuki
  • Live2D animation brings the characters to life
  • English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese language options
  • Full Japanese voice acting (Except for protagonist)

content_descriptors.notes: Contains some suggestive content not suitable for all audiences.

detailed_description:
Welcome home, Master!

STORY


One day on your way home from work, you see a girl in front of your apartment building. That wasn't the only surprise as she also appeared to have cat ears and a tail as well. Bathed in a gentle glow, you also notice the small wings on her back. Your life drastically changes upon the appearance of Mint, who claims to be an angel and became stranded on Earth with nowhere to go. This is the start of your exciting life with the energetic Mint as she learns more about life on Earth as well as you, her new master.

NEKO-MIMI SWEET HOUSEMATES is a new visual novel series focusing on the mascot characters created by illustrator, Yano Mitsuki!

name: NEKO-MIMI SWEET HOUSEMATES Vol. 1 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 or later
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space

short_description: What is one to do when face to face with a cat-eared, winged angel? Life will never be the same when the angel, Mint, moves in and becomes your housemate. A heartwarming tale featuring Yano Mitsuki's original characters!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
